verses.verse: The <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and the dry <S%H6723>land<s%> will be <S%H7797>glad.<s%> The <S%H6160>desert<s%> will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and <S%H6524>blossom<s%> like a <S%H2261>rose.<s%>

It will <S%H6524>blossom<s%> <S%H6524>abundantly,<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> even with <S%H1525>joy<s%> and <S%H7444>singing.<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>'s <S%H3519>glory<s%> Lebanon will be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1926>it,<s%> the excellence of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> and <S%H8289>Sharon.<s%> They will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3519>glory,<s%> the <S%H1926>excellence<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H559>Tell<s%> those who have a <S%H4116>fearful<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong.<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid. <S%H430>Behold,<s%> your God will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1576>retribution.<s%> He will <S%H935>come<s%> and save <S%H3467>you.<s%>
Then the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> will be <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> will be <S%H6605>unstopped.<s%>

Then the <S%H6455>lame<s%> man will <S%H1801>leap<s%> like a <S%H354>deer,<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H483>mute<s%> will <S%H7442>sing;<s%> for <S%H4325>waters<s%> will break <S%H1234>out<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5158>streams<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert.<s%>

The burning <S%H8273>sand<s%> will become a <S%H98>pool,<s%> and the thirsty <S%H6774>ground<s%> <S%H4002>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> <S%H2682>Grass<s%> with <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and <S%H1573>rushes<s%> will be in the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H8577>jackals,<s%> where they <S%H7258>lay.<s%>

A <S%H4547>highway<s%> will be <S%H1870>there,<s%> a road, and it will be <S%H7121>called<s%> The <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H1870>Way.<s%> The <S%H2931>unclean<s%> shall not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H1980>it,<s%> but it will be for those who walk in the <S%H191>Way.<s%> Wicked fools will not go <S%H8582>there.<s%>

No <S%H738>lion<s%> will be <S%H6530>there,<s%> nor will any ravenous <S%H2416>animal<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> on <S%H4672>it.<s%> They will not be found <S%H1350>there;<s%> but the redeemed will walk <S%H1980>there.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> ones will <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H7440>singing<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> will be on their <S%H7218>heads.<s%> They will <S%H5381>obtain<s%> <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H8342>joy,<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> and <S%H585>sighing<s%> will flee <S%H5127>away.<s%>"
